h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time
content: As you head into the middle, the Venom Daoist will appear again. In this fight, once you get him down to half-health, a cutscene will . He'll tell you to face him properly now that he's lost most of his arms, and another round of the fight will begin. This time, he'll be at full health but much slower with his recovery after attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time'.
The content is as follows:
As you head into the middle, the Venom Daoist will appear again. In this fight, once you get him down to half-health, a cutscene will . He'll tell you to face him properly now that he's lost most of his arms, and another round of the fight will begin. This time, he'll be at full health but much slower with his recovery after attacks.
